title: Add PWA capabilities and QR code feature to admin portal

requirements.text: Create a Progressive Web App (PWA) manifest.json file in the frontend/public directory with appropriate app metadata including app name 'Vitals AI', short_name, description, theme_color using the teal color scheme (#14b8a6), background_color, display mode set to 'standalone', and icons array with appropriate sizes for mobile installation

quotes: PWA Capabilities: Adding manifest.json and service worker to make your web app installable on mobile devices like a native app

acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json file exists in frontend/public directory
Manifest includes all required PWA fields (name, short_name, description, theme_color, background_color, display, icons)
Theme color uses the teal color from the existing design (#14b8a6 or similar)
Display mode is set to 'standalone' for app-like experience

requirements.text: Update frontend/index.html to include a link tag referencing the manifest.json file in the <head> section to enable PWA installation prompts on mobile devices

quotes: PWA Capabilities: Adding manifest.json and service worker to make your web app installable on mobile devices like a native app

acceptanceCriteria: index.html includes <link rel='manifest' href='/manifest.json'> in the head section
Mobile browsers can detect and prompt users to install the app

requirements.text: Create a QRCodeGenerator component in frontend/src/components that generates a QR code pointing to the URL 'https://vitals-ai-featuringsmarthospitals-jrg.caffeine.xyz/#caffeineAdminToken=caf86f15a219649b9883aca3e42d0418f6e4682726fd4227e005e7f46af65497' with both display and download functionality, styled consistently with the Flipkart-inspired teal design aesthetic

quotes: QR Code Features: Both viewable on screen AND downloadable as an image file

acceptanceCriteria: QRCodeGenerator component displays a QR code that encodes the exact URL provided
Component includes a download button that saves the QR code as a PNG image file
QR code is displayed in a card with teal borders matching the existing design theme
Download functionality works correctly in all modern browsers
Component styling is consistent with other admin portal components

requirements.text: Integrate the QRCodeGenerator component into the AdminDashboard component (frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.tsx) by adding it as a new section or card within the admin interface, positioned prominently for easy access

quotes: QR Code Location: Admin portal only (not visible to patients or doctors)
Display QR code on screen within admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: QRCodeGenerator component is imported and rendered within AdminDashboard
QR code section is clearly labeled (e.g., 'Admin Access QR Code' or 'Share Admin Portal')
QR code is only visible to users who have successfully authenticated to the admin portal
Layout integrates smoothly with existing admin dashboard sections without breaking the UI

constraints: Do not modify the authentication logic in AdminPortal.tsx - the code '2011' verification must remain unchanged
Do not change the existing teal color scheme or Flipkart-inspired design aesthetic
QR code feature must only be accessible in the admin portal, not in patient or doctor portals
The QR code must encode the exact URL provided: https://vitals-ai-featuringsmarthospitals-jrg.caffeine.xyz/#caffeineAdminToken=caf86f15a219649b9883aca3e42d0418f6e4682726fd4227e005e7f46af65497
nonGoals: Creating native iOS or Android applications for app store distribution
Implementing service worker for offline functionality (manifest.json only for PWA installation)
Creating multiple QR codes for different user roles
Modifying the admin authentication system or access code
